General.Name: Indigo Exploration Inc.
General.Description: Indigo Exploration Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the Republic of Burkina Faso, Mali, and Canada. It primarily explores for lithium brines and gold deposits. The company holds a 100% interest in the Hantoukoura permit covering an area of 191 square kilometers located to the east of Ouagadougou, in the Republic of Burkina Faso; the Lati 2 permit covering an area of 181 square kilometers located in the Boromo greenstone belt; the Djimbala project, that covers an area of 100 square kilometers located in Southern Mali, West Africa; and lithium brine project comprising 18 metallic and industrial minerals permits covering an area of 147,904 hectares located in central Alberta, Canada. Indigo Exploration Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6
